competencies.title: Keep work stations clean and sanitize tools, such as scissors and combs.

workProcesses.title: Apply solutions to hair for therapeutic or cosmetic purposes

competencies.title: Apply and use curlers, rollers, hot combs and curling irons to press and curl hair.
Shampoo, rinse, condition, and dry hair and scalp or hairpieces with water, liquid soap, or other solutions.
Comb, brush, and spray hair or wigs to set style.
Attach wigs or hairpieces to model heads and dress wigs and hairpieces according to instructions, samples, sketches or photographs.
Schedule client appointments.
Rebook clients at the end of their service to build and maintain clientele.

workProcesses.title: Demonstrate activity techniques or equipment use

competencies.title: Demonstrate and sell hair care products and cosmetics.

workProcesses.title: Maintain client information or service records

competencies.title: Update and maintain customer information records, such as beauty services provided.
Demonstrate and sell hair care products and hair tools.
Sell memberships- memberships include service packages (1-2 services a month).
Analyze patrons hair to determine and recommend beauty treatment or suggest hair styles.
Train or supervise other hairstylists, hairdressers, and assistants.
Train or supervise other hairstylists, hairdressers, and assistants.

workProcesses.title: Apply cleansing or conditioning agents to client hair, scalp, or skin

competencies.title: Shampoo, rinse, condition, and dry hair and scalp or hairpieces with water, liquid soap, or other solutions.
Massage and treat scalp for hygienic and remedial purposes, using hands, fingers, or vibrating equipment.

workProcesses.title: Provide medical or cosmetic advice for clients

competencies.title: Administer therapeutic medication and advise patron to seek medical treatment for chronic or contagious scalp conditions.
Recommend and explain the use of cosmetics, lotions, and creams to soften and lubricate skin and enhance and restore natural appearance.
Order, display, and maintain supplies.
Order, display, and maintain supplies.

workProcesses.title: Administer basic health care or medical treatments

competencies.title: Administer therapeutic medication and advise patron to seek medical treatment for chronic or contagious scalp conditions.

workProcesses.title: Design costumes or cosmetic effects for characters

competencies.title: Develop new styles and techniques.
Stay abreast of latest industry trends, products, research, and treatments.
